assignment

Class Order

  • java.lang.Object
    • assignment.Order

  • public class Order
extends java.lang.Object
    An order consists of the details of all the items that have been ordered, the number of items in the order, the staff who created the order, the table no of where customers were seated at, the discount which is to be given to the customer, and the total amount of the order.
    Author:
    salonigupta

      • returnTotalAfterDiscount

        public float returnTotalAfterDiscount()
        Returns the total amount of an order, after a discount has been given. A discount is given if the customer is a member of the restaurant, and it depends on the tier as well. The higher the tier, the greater the discount.
        Returns:
